sen.j: しかしその子孫に目を向けると、息子の藤原高藤は娘藤原胤子が醍醐天皇の生母となったことから内大臣に至り、早い時期で貴族社会において一定の地位を確立している。
sen.e: If we look at his descendents, however, his con, FUJWARA no Takafuji was promoted to naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) because his daughter, FUARA no Inshi (or Taneko) became the real mother of the Emperor Daigo,and established in early stage of his life a certain position in the noble society.

If we look at his descendants, however, his son, FUJIWARA no Takafuji was promoted to naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) because his daughter, FUJIWARA no Inshi (or Taneko) was the mother of the Emperor Daigo,and established for him early in his life a position in noble society.

If we look at his descendants, however, his son, FUJIWARA no Takafuji was promoted to Naidaijin (Inner Minister) because his daughter, FUJIWARA no Inshi (or Taneko) was the mother of the Emperor Daigo, and established for him early in his life a position in noble society.

sen.e: Later in Insei period (a period of government by the retired Emperor), the family of FUJIWARA no Tamefusa, who was family head eight generations after Yoshikado, prospered by gaining power and became one of clans that represent the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan.
